getText.MailAuthorization.mailErrorText_pattern: Please enter a valid email address
getText.ProfileGuides.subtitle: Well, if you didn't know, we still have a lot of guides that you haven't completed yet. Go ahead for knowledge!
getText.ProfileReferrals_Referral.subtitle: If you invite more friends, you will get more rewards!
getText.ProfileReferrals_NoReferral.subtitle: Imagine you invite 10 friends who also invite 10 friends and they complete 10 quests each. You will earn 900$. That's AWESOME!
getText.ProfileSettings.mailErrorText_pattern: Please enter a valid email address
getText.ProfileSettings.passwordErrorText: Password must be at least 8 characters (latin letters, numbers or symbols)
getText.ProfileSettings.passwordSetErrorText: Password must be at least 8 characters (latin letters, numbers or symbols)
getText.ProfileSettings.passwordNewErrorText: Password must be at least 8 characters (latin letters, numbers or symbols)
getText.ProfileWallet.title: Your wallet address
getText.ProfileWallet.subtitle: Every time I transfer a reward to your wallet, I write it down for you. So, nothing will be lost :)
getText.GuidesGallery.subtitle: Ready to turn your drawings into digital gold? Don't miss out on this incredible journey! Your artistic destiny awaits.
getText.Claim.title: Claim amount
getText.Claim.payFeeFrom: Pay transaction fee from my wallet

getVoice.GuidesGallery.mascotVoice: Ready to turn your drawings into digital gold? Don't miss out on this incredible journey! Your artistic destiny awaits.
getVoice.ProfileGuides.mascotVoice: Well, if you didn't know, we still have a lot of guides that you haven't completed yet. Go ahead for knowledge!
getVoice.ProfileReferrals_Referral.mascotVoice: If you invite more friends, you will get more rewards!
getVoice.ProfileReferrals_NoReferral.mascotVoice: Imagine you invite 10 friends who also invite 10 friends and they complete 10 quests each. You will earn 900$. That's AWESOME!
getVoice.ProfileWallet.mascotVoice: Every time I transfer a reward to your wallet, I write it down for you. So, nothing will be lost :)
getVoice.ProfileWallet_NoWallet.mascotVoice: Well, you don't have a wallet connected. If you don't know how to connect a wallet just tell me and I will show you how to do it :)
